entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
